Posts.Content: vanillacupcake wrote: My mom is on 4 rounds of Taxotere+Cytoxan, once every 3 weeks. She handled the 1st and 2nd treatments relatively well, but about 10 days after the 3rd treatment, she started breaking out in hives all over. Is this an expected side effect? Anyone experience this? How long did it last? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hives? vanillacupcake whoopsiedoodles

Posts.Content: vanillacupcake wrote: My mom was diagnosed at 49 years old with Stage 2A Grade 1. However, the lab reports after the mastectomy showed that the cancer was Grade 3. How important is the grade in determining prognosis, chances of recurrence, etc? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How much does grade matter? vanillacupcake AnneW
